content: with a small amount of yarn and a keyring you can make this cute armadillo lanyard that will keep your keys safe perfect for children but also for adults the lanyard does not stretch and is thin enough to not feel bulky around the neck this pattern is great for any crocheter the video shows all the steps how to make this lanyard it s a good opportunity to learn how to slip_stitch crochet **pattern features ** * video tutorial on youtube in english us terms * directions how to customize the size **stitches used in this pattern us terms ** slip_stitch single_crochet and invisible join **yarn ** scheepjes catona chroma i used the colors 023 zinnia and 025 honeysuckle in the video **hook ** 3 0mm **facebook ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout 1 is a place where you can ask questions share pictures and socialize with other fellow crocheters i also send live once a week in the group answering questions about my patterns etc you are very welcome to join ❀❀❀ due to the nature of a pdf pattern a refund will not be offered ❀❀❀ copyright mijo crochet 2024 this pattern is for personal use only reproduction and publication of pictures and/or pattern is not allowed 1 https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/
